channel.title: Working barrows?
channel.description: Does anyone have a tutorial on a 100% working barrows? I would be [b]EXTREMELY[/b] happy if someone could get one for me. Don't say search button... Already tried...

item.title: Working barrows?
item.dc:creator: @slomifier slomifier
item.description:
@slomifier wrote:

  1. Your not supposed to request TuTs. The search button isn’t there to look pretty.
  2. You need to show what you’ve tried. Spoon feeding is frowned upon.
  3. This isn’t that hard to make.

First code something that Spawns a brother, (whether it be random, or by tomb)
Then implicate a points system, and have it save into the moreinfo or whatever you use.
Finally add a reward system based on points, (whether it’s a point shop or using your points to open a chest that gives random stuff.

Hope it helped

Read full topic

item.title: Working barrows?
item.dc:creator: @chassy13 Chassy13
item.description:
@chassy13 wrote:

I have all of them on wL but im only willing to give you my guthans

public void guthan() { if(misc.random(2) == 1) { stillgfx(398, EnemyY, EnemyX); sendMessage("You drain your opponents health."); NewHP += hitDiff; if(NewHP > getLevelForXP(playerXP[3])) { NewHP = getLevelForXP(playerXP[3]); } } }

You figure out the rest
